title: Probability
quote: est your knowledge of probability with some fun questions!

questions.question: 01. What is the probability of getting a head in a coin toss?
02. If a die is rolled, what is the probability of getting a 5?
03. What is the probability of drawing a heart from a standard deck of cards?
04. If two dice are rolled, what is the probability of getting a sum of 7?
05. What is the probability of an impossible event?
